title: EnvrinGroup
author: EnvrinGroup
content: Simple is good, resume can be found here: https://apexpl.io/Resume_Matt_Dizak.pdfGithub: https://github.com/apexpl/ (/app/ repo is best example).Youtube: https://youtube.com/@apexphpwebsite:  https://apexpl.io/Down to earth, straight forward, hard working, experienced, entreprenurial minded back-end developer.  Language agnostic and can work in any language.  Favorite language is Rust, although primarily work in PHP as it's simply the superior choice for web development.Well versed in crypto, including bitcoin, ethereum, monero, polkadot, substrait, and so on.  Also well versed in Tor, hidden services and online security if that's your thing.  Highly skilled, ambitious, and ready to go.  Can handle projects of any size or scope, although do prefer larger projects and long-term relationships.  More than capable of taking you from conceptual / specs stage through to deployment, maintenace, and grow with you as your operation grows.Feel free to contact me anytime for a free consultation by either sending me a DM here or e-mail at matt@apexpl.io.  Look forward to working with you.
